snippet: A links golf course has opened on a remote island in Nova Scotia, and club officials are hoping that the far-flung locale will be part of its allure.
abstract: Cabot Links golf course has opened in a remote area of northwestern Nova Scotia, and club officials are hoping that the far-flung locale will be a part of its allure.
lead_paragraph: A links golf course has opened on a remote island in Nova Scotia, and club officials are hoping that the far-flung locale will be part of its allure.

headline.seo: Golf Course Transforms Mining Town in Nova Scotia
headline.main: The Increasing Allure of Faraway Fairways
headline.print_headline: The Increasing Allure Of Faraway Fairways
